a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population living in extreme poverty, World
This data follows a "cost of basic needs" approach: it represents the share of the population unable to meet basic
needs (including minimal nutrition and adequately heated shelter) according to prices of locally available goods

g.text: Share not in extreme povertyShare not in extreme poverty
Share in extreme povertyShare in extreme poverty
